p: KEGG is a primary public pathway database to understand potential function of DE genes. The top 20 pathways were showed in Figs.Â 4, 5, 6, 7. Between MM_FP and MM_LP, DE lncRNA targeted mRNAs were associated with pathways such as cell adhesion molecules (CAMs), glutathione (GSH) metabolism and bile secretion pathway (Fig. 4a, Supplementary material 7A). DE mRNAs were enriched in RNA transport, protein processing in endoplasmic reticulum and carbon metabolism pathway (Fig. 4b, Supplementary material 8A).
